detail_desc: High-waisted lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with decorative metal studs, a padded tongue, lacing at the front with a metal charm and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, small stand up collar with a tie and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.

Lace bralette in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and lacing at the back. Narrow elasticated seam under the bust.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes and satin ribbon ties.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves and slits with press-studs in the sides. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.

Suit trousers in a woven viscose blend containing some wool with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to created a fitted silhouette.
